issue.title: returning null for a custom scalar's serialize
issue.body:
There is an old issue #1057 for that.

It has been fixed in #1104. But It does not work for now (v16.3.0).

https://github.com/graphql/graphql-js/blob/b38429f4d46b17f23d15406a2ca0d1eb201864b6/src/execution/execute.ts#L783-L795

@leebyron Is it a mistake or as expected?

comment.body: Hey @IvanGoncharov, what's the recommended workaround for this?

issue.title: Error after upgrading from 16.6 to 16.8.1 with globalThis.process.env.NODE_ENV
issue.body:
Running a project with Vue3 / Quasar2 / Vite in development mode fails after update.

```
// node_modules/graphql/jsutils/instanceOf.mjs
globalThis.process && globalThis.process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production'
```

is compiled to

```
var instanceOf = globalThis.process && globalThis."development" === "production" ? function instanceOf2(value, constructor) { ... }
```

Changing

```
globalThis.process && globalThis.process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production'
```

to

```
globalThis.process && globalThis.process.env['NODE_ENV'] === 'production'
```

solves the problem for me.

comment.body: Having the same bug. It resolves to  globalThis."development" === 'production' or production and it breaks the app.

issue.title: avoid using `process.env` with `globalThis`
avoid using `process.env` with `globalThis`
